title: Fish shoal

properties.value: The fish shoal is a Hunter creature that players can capture during the Drift net fishing skilling method, requiring level 44 Hunter and 47 Fishing, and granting Hunter and Fishing experience.

Fish shoal
Released7 September 2017 (Update)
Combat level44
MembersYes
LocationUnderwater
ExamineShoald be easy to catch.
Advanced data
NPC ID7782

The fish shoal is a Hunter creature that players can capture during the Drift net fishing skilling method, requiring level 44 Hunter and 47 Fishing, and granting Hunter and Fishing experience.

Contents

  • 1 Hunter info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Hunting technique
  • 4 Loot
    • 4.1 Tertiary
  • 5 References

Hunter info[edit | edit source]

Fish shoal
Level required 44 47
Hunter XP101.5 xp
Fishing XP77 xp
RetaliationNo
TrapDrift net, Trident

Location[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Fossil Island's Underwater areaN/A11Maplink

  • Location of the fish shoals.

Hunting technique[edit | edit source]

A player chasing fish shoals into drift nets.

To be allowed access to the activity, players must first speak with Ceto, located just north of the anchor rope. 200 numulites are required as payment to enter the instanced area and allowance lasts for a full day. Players can also pay a fee of 20,000 numulites to gain permanent access.

This method of fishing and hunting makes use of drift nets, which can be crafted by using two jute fibre on a loom at level 26 Crafting. These drift nets can then be strung up underwater to catch fish. Annette, located in the area, will store up to 2,000 drift nets for the player.

Players must then chase the fish shoals into the drift nets in order to catch them. Each fish shoal fills the net up by 10% and gives Hunter and Fishing experience based on a player's current levels. Players with a merfolk trident equipped will find it easier to scare fish shoals into their drift nets. A (uncharged) trident of the seas can be used as well.

Loot[edit | edit source]

Upon harvesting a fully stocked net, the drift net will be destroyed, leaving just the reward behind. Players can use the bank option when the harvest interface is open to bank all the fish caught for a fee of 5 numulite.

The loot will contain 10 rolls on the following loot table.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch

Raw sea turtle1Varies[d 1]884120
